parameters.name: LogSeverity
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| summarize Count = count() by LogSeverity
| order by Count desc, LogSeverity asc
| project Value = LogSeverity, Label = strcat(LogSeverity, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: Action
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| where "{LogSeverity:lable}" == "All" or LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity})
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory = extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| summarize Count = count() by SubType
| order by Count desc, SubType asc
| project Value = SubType, Label = strcat(SubType, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| where "{LogSeverity:lable}" == "All" or LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity})
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where "{Action:lable}" == "All" or SubType in ({Action});
data
| summarize Count = count() by Category
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(Category:string)['Medium', 'high', 'low']) on Category
| project Category = iff(Category == '', Category1, Category), Count = iff(Category == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Category)
 on Category
| project-away Category1, TimeGenerated
| extend Categorys = Category
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend Category = 'All', Categorys = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Event category

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| where "{LogSeverity:lable}" == "All" or LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity})
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| where Category == '{CategoryFilter}' or '{CategoryFilter}'== "All"
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where "{Action:lable}" == "All" or SubType in ({Action});
data
| summarize Count = count() by SubCategory
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(SubCategory:string)['Medium', 'high', 'low']) on SubCategory
| project SubCategory = iff(SubCategory == '', SubCategory1, SubCategory), Count = iff(SubCategory == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SubCategory)
 on SubCategory
| project-away SubCategory1, TimeGenerated
| extend SubCategorys = SubCategory
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend SubCategory = 'All', SubCategorys = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Event type

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| where "{LogSeverity:lable}" == "All" or LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity})
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| where Category == '{CategoryFilter}' or '{CategoryFilter}'== "All"
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory = extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| where SubCategory == '{SubCategoryFilter}' or '{SubCategoryFilter}' == "All"
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where "{Action:lable}" == "All" or SubType in ({Action})
| summarize count() by SubType, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Event actions, by time

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| where "{LogSeverity:lable}" == "All" or LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity})
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| where Category == '{CategoryFilter}' or '{CategoryFilter}'== "All"
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory = extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| where SubCategory == '{SubCategoryFilter}' or '{SubCategoryFilter}' == "All"
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where "{Action:lable}" == "All" or SubType in ({Action});
data
| summarize Count = count() by SubType
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(SubType:string)['Medium', 'high', 'low']) on SubType
| project SubType = iff(SubType == '', SubType1, SubType), Count = iff(SubType == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SubType)
 on SubType
| project-away SubType1, TimeGenerated
| extend SubTypes = SubType
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend SubType = 'All', SubTypes = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Event action

content.query:
let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| where "{LogSeverity:lable}" == "All" or LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity})
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where Category == '{CategoryFilter}' or '{CategoryFilter}' == "All"
| where SubCategory == '{SubCategoryFilter}' or '{SubCategoryFilter}' == "All"
| where "{Action:lable}" == "All" or SubType in ({Action})
| where SubType == '{SubTypeFilter}' or '{SubTypeFilter}' == "All"
| where DestinationUserName != "";
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by DestinationUserName
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by DestinationUserName
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on DestinationUserName
| order by TotalCount desc, DestinationUserName asc
| project DestinationUserName, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Activity , DestinationUserName
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by DestinationUserName, Activity
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on DestinationUserName, Activity
| order by TotalCount desc, DestinationUserName asc
| project DestinationUserName, Activity, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on DestinationUserName
| project Id, Name = Activity, Type = 'Activity', ['Activity Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = DestinationUserName, Type = 'DestinationUserName', ['Activity Count'] = TotalCount, Trend )
| order by ['Activity Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: User activity

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| where "{LogSeverity:lable}" == "All" or LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity})
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where Category == '{CategoryFilter}' or '{CategoryFilter}' == "All"
| where SubCategory == '{SubCategoryFilter}' or '{SubCategoryFilter}' == "All"
| where "{Action:lable}" == "All" or SubType in ({Action})
| where SubType == '{SubTypeFilter}' or '{SubTypeFilter}' == "All"
| where ApplicationProtocol != ""
| summarize SentDataMB = sum(SentBytes)/1048576 , DataRecievedMB =sum(ReceivedBytes)/1048576, Amount = count() by ApplicationProtocol, DestinationPort
| order by Amount, SentDataMB, DataRecievedMB
content.title: Application protocol activities

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| where "{LogSeverity:lable}" == "All" or LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity})
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where Category == '{CategoryFilter}' or '{CategoryFilter}' == "All"
| where SubCategory == '{SubCategoryFilter}' or '{SubCategoryFilter}' == "All"
| where "{Action:lable}" == "All" or SubType in ({Action})
| where SubType == '{SubTypeFilter}' or '{SubTypeFilter}' == "All"
| where ApplicationProtocol == '{ApplicationProtocolFilter}' or '{ApplicationProtocolFilter}' == "All"
| summarize SentDataMB = sum(SentBytes)/1048576 , DataRecievedMB =sum(ReceivedBytes)/1048576 by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Data flow (MB)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| where "{LogSeverity:lable}" == "All" or LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity})
| extend Category= extract('(.*):(.*)$',1,Activity)
| extend B= extract('(.*):(.*$)',2,Activity)
| extend SubCategory= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*).*$',1,B)
| extend SubType= extract('([a-zA-Z/-]*) (.*)$',2,B)
| where Category == '{CategoryFilter}' or '{CategoryFilter}' == "All"
| where SubCategory == '{SubCategoryFilter}' or '{SubCategoryFilter}' == "All"
| where "{Action:lable}" == "All" or SubType in ({Action})
| where SubType == '{SubTypeFilter}' or '{SubTypeFilter}' == "All"
| where ApplicationProtocol == '{ApplicationProtocolFilter}' or '{ApplicationProtocolFilter}' == "All"
| extend EventResult= extract(';FortinetFortiGatelogdesc=(.*?);',1, AdditionalExtensions) 
| summarize SentDataMB = sum(SentBytes)/1048576 , DataRecievedMB =sum(ReceivedBytes)/1048576, Amount = count() by Category, Type = SubCategory, Action = SubType, DeviceEventClassID, LogSeverity, EventResult , DestinationUserName, SourceIP, DestinationIP, DestinationPort, ApplicationProtocol, Message
| order by Amount

parameters.name: DestinationIP
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
| where Activity contains "forward" 
| where DestinationIP != ""
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationIP
| order by Count desc, DestinationIP asc
| project Value = DestinationIP, Label = strcat(DestinationIP, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: DestinationPort
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Fortinet'
| where DeviceProduct contains 'Fortigate'
//| where Activity contains "forward"
| where isempty(DestinationPort) != true
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationPort
| order by Count desc, DestinationPort asc
| project Value = DestinationPort, Label = strcat(DestinationPort, "- ", Count)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Fortinet" 
| where DeviceProduct contains "Fortigate"
| where "{DestinationIP:lable}" == "All" or DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) 
| where "{DestinationPort:lable}" == "All" or DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) 
| summarize SentDataMB = sumif(SentBytes,Activity contains "forward" )/1048576 , DataRecievedMB =sumif(ReceivedBytes, Activity contains "forward")/1048576 by TimeGenerated
content.title: Forward data flow volume. by time

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Fortinet" 
| where DeviceProduct contains "Fortigate"
| where Activity contains "forward" 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == "port1"
| where "{DestinationIP:lable}" == "All" or DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) 
| where "{DestinationPort:lable}" == "All" or DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) 
| where DestinationPort > 0
| extend DestinationPorts= tostring(DestinationPort) 
| summarize TopDestinationPortsCount= count() by DestinationPorts, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Used ports over time

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Fortinet" 
| where DeviceProduct contains "Fortigate"
| where Activity contains "forward" 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == "port1"
| where "{DestinationIP:lable}" == "All" or DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) 
| where "{DestinationPort:lable}" == "All" or DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) 
| where DestinationPort > 0
| extend DestinationPorts= tostring(DestinationPort) 
| summarize TopDestinationPortsCount= count() by DestinationPorts
| top 5 by TopDestinationPortsCount  desc
content.title: Top 5 inbound dstination ports

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Fortinet" 
| where DeviceProduct contains "Fortigate"
| where Activity contains "forward" 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == "port2"
| where "{DestinationIP:lable}" == "All" or DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) 
| where "{DestinationPort:lable}" == "All" or DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) 
| where DestinationPort > 0
| extend DestinationPorts= tostring(DestinationPort) 
| summarize TopDestinationPortsCount= count() by DestinationPorts
| top 5 by TopDestinationPortsCount desc
content.title: Top 5 outbound destination ports

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Fortinet"
| where DeviceProduct contains "Fortigate"
| where Activity contains "forward"
| where DeviceInboundInterface == "port1"
| where DestinationTranslatedAddress contains "."
| where "{DestinationIP:lable}" == "All" or DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) 
| where "{DestinationPort:lable}" == "All" or DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) 
| summarize InBoundCount= count() by DestinationTranslatedAddress
| project-rename DestinationIP= DestinationTranslatedAddress
| top 5 by InBoundCount desc
content.title: Top 5 inbound destination IP addresses

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Fortinet" 
| where DeviceProduct contains "Fortigate"
| where Activity contains "forward" 
| where DeviceInboundInterface == "port2"
| where "{DestinationIP:lable}" == "All" or DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) 
| where "{DestinationPort:lable}" == "All" or DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) 
| summarize OutBoundCount= count() by DestinationIP
| top 5 by OutBoundCount desc
content.title: Top 5 outbound destination IP addresses
